title: Trump: Agencies to drop Anthropic

title: Fangzhou and Youcare Pharmaceutical Group Form Strategic Alliance to Advance AI-Driven Chronic Care Services
description: BEIJING, Feb. 28, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Fangzhou Inc. ('Fangzhou” or the 'Company”) (HKEX: 06086), a leading provider of AI-driven Internet healthcare solutions, has signed a strategic collaboration agreement with Youcare Pharmaceutical Group (悦康药业集团 or 'Youcare”) (SH: 688658), a leading integrated pharmaceutical enterprise in China. The partnership aims to accelerate the digital transformation and enhancement of chronic disease services through the application of artificial intelligence ('AI”).
